name: TheExplorers-POC
description:
A few things to note:

The art assets, aside from the background gradient (+ clouds and mountains) were made by me. The codes were done by me also.

Plugins/Unity Asset Packs I used:

  • Cinemachine
  • Zenject
  • UniRx
  • TextMeshPro
  • JMO Cartoon FX Free
  • Fantasy Wooden GUI Free

All background music and sound FXs were downloaded from freesound.org. I do not own any of the music files.

For a broader view of what I can do in a game project, please see this YouTube video of one of my works:
